section.name: Preambule
section.p: This document is work in progress. It should be kept in synch with the code as most as possible, providing a good starting point for developers who want to contribute. It describes mevenide-core architecture, which is quite stable now. However i dont think that the diagrams that are already present are not really useful. Indeed they miss some interactivity (they should be clickable, like Rose generated sites). For now i guess you will find the Javadoc more descriptive :/

i used Omondo Eclipse plugin to generate the UML Stuff. but i think to switch to Rose in the near future. Indeed omondo isnot yet as flewible as we would like it to be (in particular router algorithms are not quite efficient yet), and more disturbing, it doesnt save the layout ! tho perhaps i have missed something here. If you have any input about that issue, please let me know.
